LanguageData.KillerRabbit.label: Killer Rabbit
LanguageData.KillerRabbit.description: This small, solitary herbivore can swiftly hop between its victims and cause a massacre if provoked.
LanguageData.KillerRabbit.tools.1.label: Deathjump
LanguageData.KillerRabbit.tools.2.label: Phantomdancer
LanguageData.KillerRabbit.tools.3.label: Decapitate
